Kanya Viljoen (amụrụ na 29 Septemba 1994), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi na odee. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn Afgrond na Die Sentrum
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke duziri ihe nkiri RAAK na Like Hamlet
A mụrụ Viljoen na 29 Septemba 1994 na South Africa
N'afọ 2017, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere B.A
(Hons) Degree na Theatre and Performance na Mahadum Cape Town (UCT). O mechara nweta MA ya na ime ihe nkiri site n'otu mahadum ahụ.

N'oge ndụ ya na UCT, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu nke ụmụ akwụkwọ dịka; Lied van die Boeings (2015), I Want to Live in Woolworths (2016), Lied van Die Boeings, As You Like It, Murdering Agatha Christie (2016)
Maka ọrụ Masters ikpeazụ ya na 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na All of It, Everything, Now, Together nke Francesco Nassimbeni duziri
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ malitekwara ọrụ egwu ya, ebe ọ sonyeere otu egwu "Huey Huey"
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu egwu jazz "Vivace Music".
N'afọ 2017, o dere ma duzie egwuregwu RAAK, nke malitere na Free State Arts Festival
E mechara họpụta egwuregwu ahụ dị ka Best Production nke emume ahụ
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ meriri South African Theatre Magazine's Best Emerging Director Award
Mgbe ahụ na 2018, ọ duziri egwuregwu Like Hamlet rụrụ na Theatre Arts Admin Collective
Mgbe ahụ, o dere edemede ahụ, Mank, ebe e nyere Kanya bursary onye edemede maka edemede a.
N'afọ 2021, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri kykNET Afgrond ma rụọ ọrụ "Leora van Niekerk"

Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ sonyeere SABC2 telenovela Die Sentrum ma rụọ ọrụ "Sanette". Ọ duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi The Moment of Dying N'afọ 2021, o dere ma duzie obere ịhụnanya, Ekstasis na ihe nkiri Om teen treine te skre
